This stylish and stunning wedding wrap is perfect for the bride who loves elegant options on the special day. It shows us a great way to complete your simple bridal look with only one accessory. It can be matched perfectly with wedding ensemble or other special occasion dresses.
textAfterTable: Learn More About This Product Fine Materials Each wrap is made from carefully selected, high-quality fabics chosen for their rich texture, vibrant colors and comfort. Detailed Finishing In addition to being carefully cut and sewn, our wrap collection features striking tailored details such as ruching, ruffling and gracefully shaped collars.
